TopicTitle: EWOK RAPER III Command Module Recovery System

Articles.Content:
The EWOK RAPER project sought out to create a multi-purpose, fast-response vehicle designed solely for the recovery of astronauts whose ships are unable to return to Kearth on their own, due to damage, lack of fuel, or other unforseen circumstances. The current model, the mark III, has been proven effective in both munar and zero-gravity rescue situations, provided the rescuee\'s parachute module is intact.

EWOK RAPER III command module recovery system
The ewok raper? It rapes ewoks? What?
Odd name, odd craft... I like it!

the name is taken directly from the military callsign used on all top secret broadcasts. The callsign was intentionally misleading for security purposes. Due to its prevalent use, however, technicians have begun referring to it as simply CMRS.
Damn, this is the first really working command module recovery system, next challenge, keep it closed inside until it\'s let go by landing legs.
